section.title: shifts adding new Shift
section.para: To add a new Shift to the master list of Shifts, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When adding a new Shift to the master list of Shifts, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Shift.
Enter a brief name to describe the Shift.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a new Shift to the master list of Shifts.
Creates the Shift and adds it to the master list of Shifts.
